comments.text:
Our language bindings currently [manually add](https://searchfox.org/glean/search?q=%22X-Debug-ID%22&path=&case=false&regexp=false) the `X-Debug-ID` header to the header list coming from the new upload API.

We should probably expose an API, over FFI, to tag pings for the debug view, so that language bindings don't need to change headers themselves.
comments.author: alessio.placitelli@gmail.com
comments.creator: alessio.placitelli@gmail.com

Our language bindings currently [manually add](https://searchfox.org/glean/search?q=%22X-Debug-ID%22&path=&case=false&regexp=false) the `X-Debug-ID` header to the header list coming from the new upload API.

We should probably expose an API, over FFI, to tag pings for the debug view, so that language bindings don't need to change headers themselves.
